JOB DESCRIPTION: Your Role in Dunzo s Journey | Software Engineer - I     Are you looking to get real-world software engineering experience Look no more.     As a Software Engineer, you will play a key role in each phase of the software development lifecycle by ing your technical skills and experiences to improve software design and development methods. As an individual, you will contribute to the success of our engineering team as well as receive training and mentoring.     There are no specific technologies/languages that the role demands, but to date, most of our projects use Python and Go Lang(Extended skill sets are welcome and encouraged).
